posts.post_title: SGC T202s to trade for other T cards
posts.post_content:
Posted By: David R
I have a few T202s I would be willing to trade for t205, t206 or t202 HOFers I need or work out some trade/cash deals.  I can send scans tomorrow if anyone is interested.  The T202s I have available are:

NEARLY CAUGHT Bescher/Bates SGC 60 
BUSH JUST MISSES AUSTIN Moran/Magee SGC 60 
LOBERT ALMOST CAUGHT Mattern/Kling SGC 60 
ELBERFELD GETS HIS MAN SGC 40 
CHANCE BEATS OUT A HIT McIntyre/Archer SGC 40 
STONE ABOUT TO SWING Sheckard/Schulte SGC 40 

Please email me.
